Elaine Prata wrote:

>
> I would like a decorator in my tests for run the methods setUp and
> tearDown just one time for all methods in the test case.
> I know that exist a TestDecorator in the JUnit framework but I don't
> know how use it.

Use TestSetup

class MyTestCase {
public static Test suite() {
TestSuite suite = new TestSuite(MyTestCase.class);
TestSetup oneTimeSetup = new TestSetup(suite) {
protected void setUp() throws Exception {
doOneTimeSetUp();
}
protected void tearDown() throws Exception {
doOneTimeTearDown();
}
};
return suite;
}
}

Also, please see the newly-released book JUnit Recipes for details.

Many people on this list will invariably tell you that one-time test
setup indicates a design flaw. They are right. After you have the tests
running, I recommend you use Google to find some articles about that,
particularly on within the site http://c2.com/cgi/wiki

Good luck
